title: Retro Monopoly font
content:
Can anyone help identify either of these fonts and where you can get them?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313143225im_/http:/typophile.com/files/monopoly_3600.jpg)
author: muna0001

comments.content: ‘Community Chest’ is Mandate. A digital version of it is [Freehand 521](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313143225/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/freehand-521/).

The other one is an old Linotype face called [Gothic No. 13](http://web.archive.org/web/20150313143225/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/gothic-no-13/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26seed%3D30%26dock%3D0%26size%3D66%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DBANK%2520ERROR%2520COLLECT%2520%2524200%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dsingle%252Cot.liga), I think.
